Function.Description: The makeQuotedSymbol function converts a String into a new quoted Symbol object.

Brief.Overview-Symbol: The makeQuotedSymbol function converts the specified source value {string} and returns a new quoted symbol object.
Brief.Usage-Symbol: Normally the makeQuotedSymbol function is used to create a quoted symbol from a source String, since Symbols can be easily used as identifiers and Strings are not easily used as identifiers.

Argument.Name: string
Argument.Note: The String that will be converted into a Quoted Symbol
